It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Dubious Disc

Its producer is unknown.

name: Reaper Cloth

It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Razor Claw
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups

name: Razor Fang
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.

name: TM - Hone Claws
description:
The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: TM - Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the target with
huge,
sharp claws.

name: TM - Psyshock
description:
The user materializes an odd
psychic wave to attack the target.
This attack does physical damage.

name: TM - Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp.
Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Roar
description:
The target is scared off and
replaced by
another Pokémon in its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

name: TM - Toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target
badly poisoned.
Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: TM - Snowscape
description:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.

name: TM - Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up
its body, boosting both its Attack
and
Defense stats.

name: TM - Venoshock
description:
The user drenches the target in a
special
poisonous liquid. Its power is
doubled
if the target is poisoned.

name: TM - Hidden Power
description:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.

name: TM - Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up
Fire-type moves.

name: TM - Taunt
description:
The target is taunted into a rage
that
allows it to use only attack moves
for three turns.

name: TM - Ice Beam
description:
The target is struck with an icy-
cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze the target solid.

name: TM - Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike
the opposing team. It may also
freeze
them solid.

name: TM - Hyper Beam
description:
The target is attacked with a
powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

name: TM - Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to
suppress damage from special attacks
for five turns.

name: TM - Protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is
used in
succession.

name: TM - Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain
that falls for five turns,
powering up Water-type moves.

name: TM - Telekinesis
description:
The user makes the target float with
its
psychic power. The target is easier
to
hit for three turns.

name: TM - Safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field
that
prevents status problems for five
turns.

name: TM - Frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam on
the
second turn.

name: TM - Smack Down
description:
The user throws a stone or
projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will
fall to the ground when hit.

name: TM - Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the
target. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: TM - Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped
on the target to inflict damage. It
may
also leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes those around it.

name: TM - Return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - Dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks
on the second turn.
It can also be used to exit dungeons.

name: TM - Psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic
force. It may also reduce the
target's
Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the
target's
Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with a swift chop.
It
can also break any barrier such as
Light
Screen and Reflect.

name: TM - Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes
illusory
copies of itself to raise its
evasiveness.

name: TM - Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to
suppress damage from physical
attacks
for five turns.

name: TM - Sludge Wave
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a
giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.

name: TM - Flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an
intense
blast of fire. It may also leave the
target
with a burn.

name: TM - Sludge Bomb
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target.
It may also poison the target.

name: TM - Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned
to hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: TM - Fire Blast
description:
The target is attacked with an
intense
blast of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the target with a
burn.

name: TM - Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also
lowers the target's Speed by
preventing
its movement.

name: TM - Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds the target with
speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.

name: TM - Torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of using
the same move twice in a row.

name: TM - Facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its
power if
the user is poisoned, burned, or
has paralysis.

name: TM - Flame Charge
description:
The user cloaks itself with flame
and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user's Speed stat.

name: TM - Rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two turns.
It fully restores the user's HP and
heals
any status problem.

name: TM - Attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user,
the target becomes infatuated and
less
likely to attack.

name: TM - Thief
description:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.

name: TM - Low Sweep
description:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.

name: TM - Round
description:
The user attacks the target with a
song.
Others can join in the Round and
make
the attack do greater damage.

name: TM - Echoed Voice
description:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.

name: TM - Overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full
power.
The attack's recoil harshly reduces
the
user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Ally Switch
description:
The user teleports, switching places
with its adjacent ally. It may fail
if used consecutively.

name: TM - Focus Blast
description:
The user heightens its mental focus
and
unleashes its power.
It may also lower the target's Sp.
Def.

name: TM - Energy Ball
description:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target.
It may also lower the target's Sp.
Def.

name: TM - False Swipe
description:
A restrained attack that prevents
the
target from fainting.
The target is left with at least 1
HP.

name: TM - Scald
description:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the
target
with a burn.

name: TM - Fling
description:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.

name: TM - Charge Beam
description:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk
stat.

name: TM - Sky Drop
description:
The user takes the target into the
sky,
then drops it during the next turn.
The target cannot attack while in
the sky.

name: TM - Incinerate
description:
The user attacks the target with
fire.
If the target is holding a Berry,
the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

name: TM - Quash
description:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.

name: TM - Will-O-Wisp
description:
The user shoots a sinister, bluish-
white
flame at the target to inflict a
burn.

name: TM - Acrobatics
description:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: TM - Embargo
description:
It prevents the target from using
its held
item. Its Trainer is also prevented
from
using items on it.

name: TM - Explosion
description:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.

name: TM - Shadow Claw
description:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made
from shadows.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Payback
description:
If the user moves after the target,
this attack's power will be doubled.

name: TM - Retaliate
description:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally.
If an ally fainted in the previous
turn,
this attack's damage increases.

name: TM - Giga Impact
description:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power.
The user must rest on the next turn.

name: TM - Rock Polish
description:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag.
It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: TM - Flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts
the target's accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate
caves.

name: TM - Stone Edge
description:
The user stabs the foe with
sharpened stones from below.
It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: TM - Volt Switch
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Thunder Wave
description:
A weak electric charge is launched
at
the target. It causes paralysis if
it hits.

name: TM - Gyro Ball
description:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swords Dance
description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting
spirit. It sharply raises the user's
Attack stat.

name: TM - Struggle Bug
description:
While resisting, the user attacks
the
opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: TM - Psych Up
description:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made
by the target.

name: TM - Bulldoze
description:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit
Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

name: TM - Frost Breath
description:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in
a critical hit.

name: TM - Rock Slide
description:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing
team to inflict damage. It may also
make
the targets flinch.

name: TM - X-Scissor
description:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name: TM - Dragon Tail
description:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

name: TM - Work Up
description:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: TM - Poison Jab
description:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or
arm steeped in poison. It may also
poison the target.

name: TM - Dream Eater
description:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user's HP.

name: TM - Grass Knot
description:
The user snares the target with
grass and
trips it. The heavier the target,
the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swagger
description:
The user enrages and confuses the
target.
However, it also sharply raises the
target's Attack stat.

name: TM - Pluck
description:
The user pecks the target. If the
target
is holding a Berry, the user eats it
and
gains its effect.

name: TM - U-turn
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Substitute
description:
The user makes a copy of itself
using
some of its HP.
The copy serves as the user's decoy.

name: TM - Flash Cannon
description:
The user gathers all its light
energy and
releases it at once. It may also
lower the
target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Trick Room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which
slower Pokémon get to move first for
five turns.

name: Fast Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon with high base Speed.

name: Level Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon who are the same
level as yours.

name: Lure Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.

name: Heavy Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.

name: Love Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon of the same
evolution line as yours, but of the
opposite gender. It doesn't help
against genderless foes.

name: Friend Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which makes a Pokémon very
happy upon capture. It works well on
Pokémon which evolve due to happiness.

name: Moon Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: Sport Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball for the
Bug-Catching Contest.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Prism Scale
description:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.

name: Eviolite
description:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

name: Float Stone
description:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.

name: Rocky Helmet
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder of this item is hit by a
move that makes contact, it will
inflict damage on the attacker for
16.67% of their maximum HP per-hit.

name: Air Balloon
description:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.

name: Red Card
description:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.

name: Ring Target
description:
Moves that would otherwise have no
effect will land on the Pokémon that
holds it.

name: Binding Band
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes the
damage inflicted by binding moves used
by the holder to increase from 12.5%
to 16.7% of the opponent's maximum HP
at the end of each turn.

name: Absorb Bulb
description:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.

name: Cell Battery
description:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

name: Eject Button
description:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.

name: Fire Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Fire-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Water Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Electric Gem

It increases the power of Electric-

name: Normal Gem

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Health Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base HP of a
single Pokémon.

name: Muscle Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Attack
stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Resist Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Defense
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Genius Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Sp. Atk
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Clever Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Sp. Def
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Swift Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Speed stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Pretty Wing
description:
Though this feather is beautiful, it's
just a regular feather and has no
effect on Pokémon.

name: Cover Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.

name: Plume Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

name: BalmMushroom
description:
A rare mushroom which gives off a nice
fragrance.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Big Nugget
description:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives
off
a lustrous gleam.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Pearl String
description:
Very large pearls that sparkle in a
pretty silver color.
A maniac will buy them for a high
price.

name: Comet Shard
description:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: TM - Wild Charge
description:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity
and smashes into its target.
It also damages the user a little.

name: TM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can
shatter a rock. It may also lower
the
target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Snarl
description:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about
something, making the target's Sp.
Atk
stat decrease.

name: Name Change Contract
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's name.

Can only be used once.

name: Makeover Kit
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's base appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: Team Name Change Plaque
description:
An item which can be used to change
your team's name and tag.

Can only be used once.
Must be used by team leader.

name: Ability Pill
description:
A pill that can be used to switch the
ability of a Pokémon.

Consumed on use.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 7 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 15 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 30 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Plain Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Dry Seed
description:
A dry seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Dry Seed
description:
A dry seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Sweet Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Sweet Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Bitter Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Bitter Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Sour Seed
description:
A sour seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Sour Seed
description:
A sour seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Genderswap Ticket
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's gender and base
appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: PC Expansion Drive
description:
An item which can be used to expand
the PC of a single character by 60
slots.

20/20 uses left.

name: Cut Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Cut
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each
region to use.

name: Fly Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Fly
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

name: Dive Ocarina

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each

name: Rock Climb Ocarina

Requires a certain badge in each

name: Defog Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Defog
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each
region to use.

name: 100RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 100RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: 500RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 500RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: 1,000RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 1,000RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Lucky Egg (Small)
description:
An item which increases the amount of
EXP gained for a short period of
time.

1.50x EXP gain.
Stacks with other bonuses.
Consumed upon use.
Effects last 30 minutes.

name: Battle Box Expansion Drive
description:
An item which can be used to expand
the PC to include 3 more Battle Boxes.

8/8 uses left.

name: Whirlpool Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Whirlpool outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each
region to use.

name: Dig Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Dig
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

name: Teleport Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Teleport outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

name: Headbutt Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Headbutt outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

This item may only be used in Johto.

name: Broom Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will clear stat drops on the
allied field, stat boosts on the foe's
field, and cloaks the allied field
with Mist for 2 turns.

name: Bat Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will protect the allied field
with Light Screen and Reflect for 3
turns.

name: Pumpkin Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will heal the allied field by
33% of their maximum HP.

name: Ghost Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will heal any status ailments
of allies.

name: Cat Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will double the allied field's
speed for 4 turns.

name: Mystic Watch
description:
An ancient, otherworldly-looking watch.

Use to reset the cooldown of a
Summoning Orb.
Consumed upon use.

name: TM - Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. It will fail if
the user
is hit before it is used.

name: TM - Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with
a pulsing blast of water.
It may also confuse the target.

name: TM - Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the
target. Two to five seeds are shot
in
rapid succession.

name: TM - Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

name: TM - Iron Tail
description:
The target is slammed with a steel-
hard
tail. It may also lower the target's
Defense stat.

name: TM - Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a
quick
jolt of electricity.
This attack cannot be evaded.

name: TM - Secret Power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects vary
depending on the user's environment.

name: TM - Steel Wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of
steel.
It may also raise the user's Defense
stat.

name: TM - Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to
exchange Abilities with the target.

name: TM - Snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: TM - Roost
description:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user's HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: TM - Brine
description:
If the target's HP is down to about
half,
this attack will hit with double
the power.

name: TM - Endure
description:
The user endures any attack with at
least
1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if
it is
used in succession.

name: TM - Dragon Pulse
description:
The target is attacked with a shock
wave
generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: TM - Drain Punch
description:
An energy-draining punch. The user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken
by the target.

name: TM - Silver Wind
description:
The target is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind.
It may also raise all the user's
stats.

name: TM - Recycle
description:
The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

name: TM - Avalanche
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the
damage if the user has been hurt by
the
target in the same turn.

name: TM - Stealth Rock
description:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones
around the opponent's team. The trap
hurts opponents that switch into
battle.

name: TM - Captivate
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user,
the target is charmed into harshly
lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Dark Pulse
description:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued
with dark thoughts.
It may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Sleep Talk
description:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses
one of the moves it knows.

name: TM - Natural Gift
description:
The user draws power to attack by
using
its held Berry.
The Berry determines its type and
power.

name: TM - Leech Life
description:
The user drains the target's blood.
The user's HP is restored by half
the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Nature Power
description:
An attack that makes use of nature's
power. Its effects vary depending on
the
user's environment.

name: TM - Air Slash
description:
The user attacks with a blade of air
that
slices even the sky. It may also
make the
target flinch.

name: TM - Bug Buzz
description:
The user vibrates its wings to
generate a
damaging sound wave. It may also
lower
the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Power Gem
description:
The user attacks with a ray of light
that
sparkles as if it were made of
gemstones.

name: TM - Razor Wind
description:
A two-turn attack. Blades of wind
hit
opposing Pokémon on the second turn.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Brave Bird
description:
The user tucks in its wings and
charges
from a low altitude.
The user also takes serious damage.

name: TM - Whirlwind
description:
The target is blown away, to be
replaced
by another Pokémon in its party. In
the
wild, the battle ends.

name: TM - Nasty Plot
description:
The user stimulates its brain by
thinking
bad thoughts.
It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

name: TM - Thunder Fang
description:
The user bites with electrified
fangs.
It may also make the target flinch
or
leave it with paralysis.

name: TM - Ice Fang
description:
The user bites with cold-infused
fangs.
It may also make the target flinch
or
leave it frozen.

name: TM - Fire Fang
description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked
fangs.
It may also make the target flinch
or leave
it burned.

name: TM - Psycho Cut
description:
The user tears at the target with
blades
formed by psychic power.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Horn Drill
description:
The user stabs the target with a
horn
that rotates like a drill.
If it hits, the target faints
instantly.

name: TM - Take Down
description:
A reckless, full-body charge attack
for
slamming into the target.
It also damages the user a little.

name: TM - Leaf Storm
description:
The user whips up a storm of leaves
around
the target. The attack's recoil
harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Power Whip
description:
The user violently whirls its vines
or
tentacles to harshly lash the target.

name: TM - Pin Missile
description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target
in rapid succession.
They hit two to five times in a row.

name: TM - Cross Poison
description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous
blade
that may also leave the target
poisoned.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Water Gun
description:
The target is blasted with a
forceful shot of water.

name: TM - Hydro Pump
description:
The target is blasted by a huge
volume
of water launched under great
pressure.

name: TM - BubbleBeam
description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully
ejected
at the opposing team. It may also
lower
their Speed stats.

name: TM - Submission
description:
The user grabs the target and
recklessly
dives for the ground. It also hurts
the
user slightly.

name: TM - Mega Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken
by the target.

name: TM - Dragon Rage
description:
This attack hits the target with a
shock
wave of pure rage. This attack
always
inflicts 40 HP damage.

name: TM - Fire Spin
description:
The target becomes trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire that rages for
four
to five turns.

name: TM - Heavy Slam
description:
The user slams into the target with
its
heavy body. The more the user
outweighs
the target, the greater its damage.

name: TM - Electro Ball
description:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user
is
than the target, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Fissure
description:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground
and drops the target in.
The target instantly faints if it
hits.

name: TM - Agility
description:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to
move faster. It sharply boosts
the Speed stat.

name: TM - Rage
description:
As long as this move is in use, the
power
of rage raises the Attack stat each
time the user is hit in battle.

name: TM - Teleport
description:
When used by a Trainer, it switches
the user out no matter what. Wild
Pokémon may flee instantly. When
used out of battle, it will warp you
to the last Pokémon Center.

name: TM - Stored Power
description:
The user attacks the target with
stored
power. The more the user's stats are
raised, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Hex
description:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected
by status problems.

name: TM - Focus Energy
description:
The user takes a deep breath and
focuses so that critical hits land
more easily.

name: TM - Bide
description:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.

name: TM - Egg Bomb
description:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict damage.

name: TM - Skull Bash
description:
The user tucks in its head to raise
its
Defense in the first turn, then
rams the target on the next turn.

name: TM - Amnesia
description:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Razor Shell
description:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the
target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Heat Crash
description:
The user slams its target with its
flame-
covered body. The more the user
outweighs
the target, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Tail Slap
description:
The user attacks by striking the
target
with its hard tail. It hits the
target two
to five times in a row.

name: TM - Hurricane
description:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent
in a fierce wind that flies up into
the sky.
It may also confuse the target.

name: TM - Psywave
description:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave.
The attack varies in intensity.

name: TM - Tri Attack
description:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Curse
description:
A move which functions differently
depending on the type of its user.
When used by a Ghost, the target
loses 1/4 of their maximum HP every
turn, but the user immediately loses
half of theirs. For other types, it
will reduce Speed while increasing
Attack & Defense by 1 stage.

name: TM - Reversal
description:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.

name: TM - Scary Face
description:
The user frightens the target with a
scary
face to harshly reduce its Speed
stat.

name: TM - Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of spikes at
the
opposing team's feet. The trap hurts
Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: TM - Zap Cannon
description:
The user fires an electric blast
like a
cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.

name: TM - Detect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is
used
in succession.

name: TM - Charm
description:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.

name: TM - Megahorn
description:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target
with no letup.

name: TM - DragonBreath
description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the
target with paralysis.

name: TM - Baton Pass
description:
The user switches places with a
Pokémon in your party, passing along
some effects. Will not pass stat
changes or status ailments.

name: TM - Encore
description:
The user compels the target
to keep using only the move
it last used for three turns.

name: TM - Sweet Scent
description:
Expels a sweet scent which lowers
the foe's Evasion. It lures hordes
of Pokémon when used in areas which
have wild encounters, but requires
more PP.

name: TM - Crunch
description:
Crunches the foe with its sharp
teeth. It may lower their Defense
stat.

name: TM - Future Sight
description:
Two turns after this move is used,
a hunk of psychic energy
attacks the target.

name: TM - Whirlpool
description:
Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: TM - Beat Up
description:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack
the target. The more party Pokémon,
the greater the number of attacks.

name: TM - Revenge
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the
damage if the user has been hurt by
the
opponent in the same turn.

name: TM - Imprison
description:
If the opponents know any move also
known
by the user, the opponents are
prevented
from using it.

name: TM - Screech
description:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Blaze Kick
description:
The user launches a kick that lands
a
critical hit more easily.
It may also leave the target with a
burn.

name: TM - Weather Ball
description:
An attack move that varies in power
and
type depending on the weather.

name: TM - Fake Tears
description:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Cosmic Power
description:
The user absorbs a mystical power
from
space to raise its Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Sand Tomb
description:
The user traps the target inside a
harshly
raging sandstorm for four to five
turns.

name: TM - Muddy Water
description:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water
at the opposing team.
It may also lower the targets'
accuracy.

name: TM - Icicle Spear
description:
The user launches sharp icicles at
the
target. It strikes two to five times
in
a row.

name: TM - Mud Shot
description:
The user attacks by hurling a blob
of mud
at the target.
It also reduces the target's Speed.

name: TM - Magical Leaf
description:
The user scatters curious leaves
that chase the target.
This attack will not miss.

name: TM - Leaf Blade
description:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Dragon Dance
description:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic,
powerful dance that boosts its
Attack and
Speed stats.

name: TM - Rock Blast
description:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target.
Two to five rocks are launched in
quick
succession.

name: TM - Close Combat
description:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts
the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

name: TM - Assurance
description:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's
power is doubled.

name: TM - Power Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to
switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.

name: TM - Guard Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to
switch changes to its Defense and
Sp. Def with the target.

name: TM - Pay Day
description:
Throws coins at the foe which are
recovered after the battle. The
amount of coins increases with the
foe's level. It's only effective
once per battle.

name: TM - Toxic Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at
the opponent's feet. They poison
opponents that switch into battle.

name: TM - Flare Blitz
description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges
at the target. The user sustains
serious
damage and may leave the target
burned.

name: TM - Aura Sphere
description:
The user looses a blast of aura
power
from deep within its body at the
target.
This move is certain to hit.

name: TM - Counter
description:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the
damage taken.

name: TM - Metronome
description:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates
its brain into randomly using nearly
any move.

name: TM - Mega Kick
description:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched
with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Mega Punch
description:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown
with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Double-Edge
description:
A reckless, life-risking tackle.
It also damages the user by a fairly
large
amount, however.

name: TM - Body Slam
description:
The user drops onto the target
with its full body weight. It may
also
leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Softboiled
description: Heals the user by half of its max HP.

name: TM - Rollout
description:
The user continually rolls into the
target
over five turns. It becomes stronger
each time it hits.

name: TM - DynamicPunch
description:
The user punches the target with
full,
concentrated power.
It confuses the target if it hits.

name: TM - Mimic
description:
The user copies the target's last
move.
The move can be used during battle
until the Pokémon is switched out.

name: TM - Fury Cutter
description:
The target is slashed with scythes
or
claws. Its power increases if it
hits
in succession.

name: TM - Seismic Toss
description:
The target is thrown using the power
of
gravity. It inflicts damage equal to
the user's level.

name: TM - Mud-Slap
description:
The user hurls mud in the target's
face to
inflict damage and lower its
accuracy.

name: TM - Psybeam
description:
The target is attacked with a
peculiar ray.
It may also cause confusion.

name: TM - Confuse Ray
description:
The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

name: TM - Poison Tail
description:
The user hits the target with its
tail.
It may also poison the target.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Metal Claw
description:
The target is raked with steel claws.
It may also raise the user's Attack
stat.

name: TM - Swift
description:
Star-shaped rays are shot at the
opposing
team. This attack never misses.

name: TM - Icy Wind
description:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets'
Speed stat.

name: TM - Air Cutter
description:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Night Shade
description:
The user makes the target see a
frightening mirage. It inflicts
damage
matching the user's level.

name: TM - Foul Play
description:
The user turns the target's power
against it. The higher the target's
Attack stat, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Seed Bomb
description:
The user slams a barrage of hard-
shelled
seeds down on the target from above.

name: TM - Iron Head
description:
The user slams the target
with its steel-hard head.
It may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Gunk Shot
description:
The user shoots filthy garbage
at the target to attack.
It may also poison the target.

name: TM - Iron Defense
description:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

name: TM - Drill Run
description:
The user crashes into its target
while
rotating its body like a drill.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Trick
description:
The user catches the target off
guard
and swaps its held item with its own.

name: TM - Tailwind
description:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind
that ups the Speed of all party
Pokémon
for four turns.

name: TM - Hyper Voice
description:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing
shout with the power to inflict
damage.

name: TM - Heat Wave
description:
The user attacks by exhaling hot
breath
on the opposing team. It may also
leave
targets with a burn.

name: TM - Earth Power
description:
The user makes the ground under
the target erupt with power.
It may also lower the target's Sp.
Def.

name: TM - Outrage
description:
The user rampages and attacks for
two
to three turns.
It then becomes confused, however.

name: TM - Draco Meteor
description:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky
onto the target. The attack's recoil
harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk
stat.

name: TM - Fire Punch
description:
The target is punched with a fiery
fist.
It may also leave the target with a
burn.

name: TM - Ice Punch
description:
The target is punched with an icy
fist.
It may also leave the target frozen.

name: TM - ThunderPunch
description:
The target is punched with an
electrified
fist. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: TM - Zen Headbutt
description:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head
and attacks the target.
It may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Helping Hand
description:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.

name: TM - Low Kick
description:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target
fall over. It inflicts greater
damage on
heavier targets.

name: TM - Acid Spray
description:
The user spits fluid that works to
melt
the target. This harshly reduces
the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Headbutt
description:
The user sticks out its head and
attacks
by charging straight into the target.
It may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Selfdestruct
description:
The user attacks everything around
it
by causing an explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

name: TM - Superpower
description:
The user attacks the target with
great
power. However, it also lowers the
user's Attack and Defense.

name: TM - Charge
description:
The user charges up, doubling the
power of the next Electric-type move.
It also raises the Sp. Def of the
user by 1 stage.

name: TM - Haze
description:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates
every stat change among all the
Pokémon
engaged in battle.

name: TM - Spite
description:
The user unleashes its grudge on the
move
last used by the target by cutting 4
PP
from it.

name: TM - Gravity
description:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns,
making moves involving flying
unusable
and negating Levitate.

name: TM - Knock Off
description:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.

name: TM - Bug Bite
description:
The user bites the target. If the
target
is holding a Berry, the user eats it
and
gains its effect.

name: TM - Super Fang
description:
The user chomps hard on the
target with its sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target's HP to half.

name: TM - Vacuum Wave
description:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave
of pure vacuum at the target. This
move
always goes first.

name: TM - Uproar
description:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time,
no one can fall asleep.

name: Grass Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
refreshingly green field.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Flame Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of flames
in blazing red.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bubble Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a blue
world underwater.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bloom Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of pretty
floral patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Tunnel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
dimly
lit coal mine.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Steel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of cool
mechanical designs.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Heart Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of giant
heart patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Snow Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
chilly, snow-covered world.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Space Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print depicting
the huge expanse of space.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Air Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of
colorful letter sets.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Mosaic Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
vivid
rainbow pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Brick Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
tough-looking brick pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: HM - Cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or a
claw.
It can also be used to cut down
thin trees.

name: HM - Fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its
target
on the second turn. It can also be
used for flying to any familiar town.

name: HM - Surf
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave.
It can also be used for crossing
water.

name: HM - Strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch
thrown
at maximum power. It can also be
used
to move heavy boulders.

name: HM - Defog
description:
A strong wind blows away the
target's
obstacles such as Reflect or Light
Screen.
It also lowers the target's
evasiveness.

name: HM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can
shatter a rock. It may also lower
the
target's Defense stat.

name: HM - Waterfall
description:
The user charges at the target
and may make it flinch.
It can also be used to climb a
waterfall.

name: HM - Rock Climb
description:
The user attacks the target by
smashing
into it with incredible force.
It may also confuse the target.

name: Explorer Kit
description:
A bag filled with convenient tools
for exploring. It provides access to
the Underground.

name: Loot Sack
description:
A sturdy, spacious bag that is used
to carry loot obtained in the coal
mine.

name: Rule Book
description:
It lists the rules for holding battles.
For linked battles, you may choose
which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
description:
A tool that can search out Pokémon
that are hiding in grass. Its battery
is
recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
description:
A card that lists the Battle Points
you have earned.

name: Journal
description:
A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.

name: Seal Case
description:
A case for storing Seals that can be
applied to the capsule cases of Poké
Balls.

name: Fashion Case
description:
A fancy case for the tidy and
organized storage of colorful Pokémon
Accessories.

name: Seal Bag
description:
A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for
decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
description:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend Codes
,
and keeping a record of game play.

name: Works Key
description:
A large key for operating the doors of
the Valley Windworks in the canyon.
It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
description:
An ancient good-luck charm made of
Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder
of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
description:
A card key for disengaging security
systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it
can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
description:
A mythical chain that is said to link
the legendary Pokémon that created
the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your
present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description:
A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

name: Coin Case
description:
A case for holding Coins obtained at
the Game Corner.
It holds up to 50,000 Coins.

name: Old Rod
description:
An old and beat-up fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck
description:
A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK.
It helps promote healthy growth of
Berries planted in soft soil.

name: Poffin Case
description:
A case for storing Poffin cooked from
Berries.

name: Bicycle
description:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

name: Suite Key
description:
A key to one of the suites at the
luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd
reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak's Letter
description:
A letter from Prof. Oak.
Written in it is a request for you to
go to Rt. 224.

name: Lunar Wing
description:
A feather that glows like the moon.
It is said to possess the power to
dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
description:
A card needed for entering the inn in
Canalave City. Oddly, the last date
marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute
description:
A flute that puts out echoing sounds
that do not seem to be of this world.
It is unknown who made it.

name: S.S. Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on the
ferry S.S. Anne. It has a drawing of a
ship on it.

name: Contest Pass
description:
The pass required for entering Pokémon
Contests. It has a drawing of an award
ribbon on it.

name: Parcel
description:
A parcel entrusted in your care.
You are supposed to deliver it to your
childhood friend who left Twinleaf
Town.

name: Coupon 1
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 2
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 3
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Storage Key
description:
The key to Team Galactic's sinister
warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.

name: SecretPotion
description:
A fantastic medicine dispensed by the
pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully
heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

name: Vs. Recorder
description:
An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

name: Gracidea
description:
A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets
to convey gratitude on special
occasions like birthdays.

name: Secret Key
description:
A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a
special
electric signal to open a door.

name: Grass Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
refreshingly green field.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Flame Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of flames
in blazing red.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bubble Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a blue
world underwater.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bloom Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of pretty
floral patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Tunnel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
dimly
lit coal mine.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Steel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of cool
mechanical designs.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Heart Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of giant
heart patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Snow Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
chilly, snow-covered world.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Space Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print depicting
the huge expanse of space.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Air Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of
colorful letter sets.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Mosaic Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
vivid
rainbow pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Brick Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
tough-looking brick pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: HM - Cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or a
claw.
It can also be used to cut down
thin trees.

name: HM - Fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its
target
on the second turn. It can also be
used for flying to any familiar town.

name: HM - Surf
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave.
It can also be used for crossing
water.

name: HM - Strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch
thrown
at maximum power. It can also be
used
to move heavy boulders.

name: HM - Whirlpool
description:
Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: HM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can
shatter a rock. It may also lower
the
target's Defense stat.

name: HM - Waterfall
description:
The user charges at the target
and may make it flinch.
It can also be used to climb a
waterfall.

name: HM - Rock Climb
description:
The user attacks the target by
smashing
into it with incredible force.
It may also confuse the target.

name: Loot Sack
description:
A sturdy, spacious bag that is used
to carry loot obtained in the coal
mine.

name: Rule Book
description:
It lists the rules for holding battles.
For linked battles, you may choose
which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
description:
A tool that can search out Pokémon
that are hiding in grass. Its battery
is
recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
description:
A card that lists the Battle Points
you have earned.

name: Journal
description:
A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.

name: Seal Case
description:
A case for storing Seals that can be
applied to the Capsule cases of
Poké Balls.

name: Fashion Case
description:
A fancy case for the tidy arrangement
and storage of whimsical Pokémon
Accessories.

name: Seal Bag
description:
A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for
decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
description:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend Codes
,
and keeping a record of game play.

name: Works Key
description:
A large key for operating the doors of
the Valley Windworks in the canyon.
It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
description:
An ancient good-luck charm made of
Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder
of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
description:
A card key for disengaging security
systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it
can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
description:
A mythical chain that is said to link
the legendary Pokémon that created
the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your
present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description:
A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

name: Coin Case
description:
A case for holding coins obtained at
the Game Corner.
It holds up to 50,000 coins.

name: Old Rod
description:
An old and beat-up fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck
description:
A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK.
It helps promote healthy growth of
Berries planted in soft soil.

name: Poffin Case
description:
A case for storing Poffin cooked from
Berries.

name: Bicycle
description:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

name: Suite Key
description:
A key to one of the suites at the
luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd
reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak's Letter
description:
A letter from Prof. Oak.
Written in it is a request for you to
go to Rt. 224.

name: Lunar Wing
description:
A feather that glows like the moon.
It is said to possess the power to
dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
description:
A card needed for entering the inn in
Canalave City. Oddly, the last date
marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute
description:
A flute that puts out echoing sounds
that do not seem to be of this world.
It is unknown who made it.

name: S.S. Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on the
ferry S.S. Aqua. It has a drawing of a
ship on it.

name: Contest Pass
description:
The pass required for entering Pokémon
Contests. It has a drawing of an award
ribbon on it.

name: Parcel
description:
A parcel entrusted in your care.
You are supposed to deliver it to your
childhood friend who left Twinleaf
Town.

name: Coupon 1
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 2
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 3
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Storage Key
description:
The key to Team Galactic's sinister
warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.

name: SecretPotion
description:
A fantastic medicine dispensed by the
pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully
heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

name: Vs. Recorder
description:
An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

name: Gracidea
description:
A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets
to convey gratitude on special
occasions like birthdays.

name: Secret Key
description:
A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a
special
electric signal to open a door.

name: Apricorn Box
description:
A handy box where you can store up to
99 Apricorns of each kind.

name: UNOWN Report
description:
A report of all the discovered kinds
of UNOWN.

name: Berry Pots
description:
Handy containers for cultivating
Berries wherever you go.

name: Dowsing MCHN
description:
It checks for unseen items in the area
and makes noise and lights when it
finds something.

name: Blue Card
description:
A card to save points for the
Buena's Password show.

name: SlowpokeTail
description:
A very tasty tail of something.
It sells for a high price.

name: Clear Bell
description:
A very old-fashioned bell that makes a
gentle ringing.

name: Card Key
description:
A card key that opens a shutter in the
Radio Tower.

name: Basement Key
description:
A key that opens a door in the
Goldenrod Tunnel.

name: SquirtBottle
description:
A bottle used for watering plants in
the
Berry Pots.

name: Red Scale
description:
A scale from the red GYARADOS. It
glows
red like a flame.

name: Lost Item
description: The Poké Doll lost by the Copycat.

name: Pass
description:
A ticket required for riding the
Magnet
Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you'd like.

name: Machine Part
description:
An important machine part for the
Power Plant that was stolen.

name: Silver Wing
description:
A strange, silvery feather
that sparkles.

name: Rainbow Wing
description:
A mystical, rainbow feather
that sparkles.

name: Mystery Egg
description:
A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr.
Pokémon. What's in the Egg is unknown.

name: Photo Album
description:
A nice photo album for storing all the
photos taken along your adventure.

name: GB Sounds
description:
A music player that allows you to
listen
to nostalgic songs. It's operated with
a single switch.

name: Tidal Bell
description:
An old-fashioned bell with a gentle,
soothing sound.

name: RageCandyBar
description:
A famous candy in Mahogany Town. Many
tourists like to buy them to take home.

name: Jade Orb
description:
A shiny green orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Lock Capsule
description:
A sturdy Capsule that can only be
opened with a special key.

name: Red Orb
description:
A shiny red orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Blue Orb
description:
A shiny blue orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Enigma Stone
description:
A crystal ball that was excavated from
the ground. A very beautiful stone
that
is covered with bits of rock and earth.
